mapper.delete: delete from grade where s_id =#{sId} AND c_id =#{cId}
mapper.select: select course.c_id,c_name,c_credit,r_id,course.t_id,t_time,teacher.t_name from course,teacher where course.t_id = teacher.t_id EXCEPT (select course.c_id,c_name,c_credit,r_id,course.t_id,t_time,teacher.t_name from grade,course,teacher where grade.c_id=course.c_id AND grade.s_id=1001 AND teacher.t_id=course.t_id)
select course.c_id,c_name,c_credit,r_id,course.t_id,t_name,t_time from grade,course,teacher where grade.c_id=course.c_id AND grade.s_id=#{sId} AND teacher.t_id=course.t_id
select course.*,teacher.t_name,grade.c_grade from grade,course,teacher where grade.c_id=course.c_id AND grade.s_id=#{sId} AND teacher.t_id=course.t_id
